main_text:
Newton
4. Newton

Newton articulated a clearer, more coherent, and more physically
plausible account of motion that any that had come before. Still, as
we will see, there have been a number of widely held misunderstandings
of Newton’s views, and it is not completely clear how best to
understand the absolute space that he postulated.
entry_title: Absolute and Relational Space and Motion: Classical Theories
